original_title: ポルノ・レポート　人妻売春
overview: A housewife covertly works in a high-class brothel in Tokyo with other married women. She never wants her husband to know that she is a prostitute. The brothel and its employees were making good money, but after the accidental death of one housewife, things begin to go wrong.
title: Porno report: Hitozuma baishun
